mapper.select: select MEDICALORDER_ID,MEDICALORDERNO,MEDICALORDERGENERATIONTIME,MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME, MEDICALORDEREXECUTIONTIME,MEDICALCENTER_ID,STATUS from tb_medicalorder where MEDICALORDERNO = #{ORDERNO} and STATUS != '已确认'

update

MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME = #{MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME},
MEDICALORDEREXECUTIONTIME = #{MEDICALORDEREXECUTIONTIME},
MEDICALTOTALAMOUNT = #{MEDICALTOTALAMOUNT}, STATUS = #{STATUS}, MEDICALORDER_ID = MEDICALORDER_ID where MEDICALORDER_ID = #{MEDICALORDER_ID}
mapper.select: select m.MEDICALORDER_ID as MEDICALORDER_ID, m.MEDICALORDERNO as MEDICALORDERNO, m.MEDICALORDERGENERATIONTIME as MEDICALORDERGENERATIONTIME, m.MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME as MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME, m.MEDICALORDEREXECUTIONTIME as MEDICALORDEREXECUTIONTIME, m.MEDICALTOTALAMOUNT as MEDICALTOTALAMOUNT, m.STATUS as STATUS, m.CREATEBY as CREATEBY, m.CREATEON as CREATEON, sau.`NAME` as `NAME`, sau.PHONE as PHONE from tb_medicalorder m LEFT JOIN tb_order o ON m.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN sys_app_user sau ON o.APP_USERID = sau.USER_ID where MEDICALORDER_ID = #{MEDICALORDER_ID}
